EmailTemplate.name: RE: Automatic reply: my time cards are on their way!! (1343408200.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Automatic reply: my time cards are on their way!! (1343408200.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Joan, You don’t have to match them up with the pay period, just enter them in within 60 days of incurring the expense and we will apply to the next available payroll cycle. Thanks!Sara From: Joan Trant [mailto:joantrant@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, July 27, 2012 12:02 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Automatic reply: my time cards are on their way!! Great! now I just need to send you the expenses that correspond to that -extended! - pay period, right? They're on their way today. Thanks. Joan-- Joan TrantCEOSOPHIA - Social Philanthropy and Investment AdvisorsM +1 917 763 6361skype: joan.trantjoantrant@gmail.com <mailto:joantrant@gmail.com>Sophia, wisdom in Greek, is the combination of knowledge, insight and judgment. It is the comprehension of what is true coupled with optimum decisions as to actions that bring about the greater good. On Fri, Jul 27, 2012 at 11:33 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Joan, Thanks for entering your time and expenses. The time has been approved. There is no problem with you using that name – also I really like it! It may be worth looking into filing a DBA (doing business as) so that you have the rights to the name, not necessary but just a thought. Have a great weekend!Sara From: Joan Trant [mailto:joantrant@gmail.com <mailto:joantrant@gmail.com>] Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2012 8:43 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Automatic reply: my time cards are on their way!! Sara, my time cards are submitted through June. I am now working on submitting the past three weeks time cards and also inputting expenses. I have a question: I want to use a name for my consulting work that reflects the type of service I am providing. I have come up with the following: Joan TrantCEOSOPHIA - Social Philanthropy and Investment AdvisorsM +1 917 763 6361 <tel:%2B1%20917%20763%206361>skype: joan.trantjoantrant@gmail.com <mailto:joantrant@gmail.com>Sophia, wisdom in Greek, is the combination of knowledge, insight and judgment. It is the comprehension of what is true coupled with optimum decisions as to actions that bring about the greater good. I don't think there's any problem with me using this, but if there is, please let me know. Thanks again, JoanOn Thu, Jul 26, 2012 at 3:43 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Thank you for your message. I am at an off-site meeting for the rest of the day and will have limited access to voicemail and email. I will return you message as quickly as possible. Sara Conde
